org.panthercode.arctic.core.settings.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • org.panthercode.arctic.core.settings.configuration.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Settings

    public class Configuration
extends java.util.Properties
    Class to store related items persistently. This class make the read and write operation a little bit more comfortable than Properties class do.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
